```
Usage: vcd vapp create [OPTIONS] <catalog> <template> <name>

Options:
  -n, --network <network>         Network
  -i, --ip-allocation-mode <ip-allocation-mode>
                                  IP allocation mode
  -m, --memory <MB>               Amount of memory in MB
  -c, --cpu <virtual-cpus>        Number of CPUs
  -d, --disk-size <MB>            size of the vm home disk in MB
  -v, --vm-name <vm-name>         VM name
  -o, --hostname <hostname>       Hostname
  -s, --storage-profile <storage-profile>
                                  Name of the storage profile for the vApp
  -a, --accept-all-eulas          Accept all EULAs
  -h, --help                      Show this message and exit.

```
